section.p: The sky is the colour of burning sulphur. From behind the clouds conies the growl of thunder. The sailors mutter in fear. ‘It is the wrath of Elnir,’ says the mate. ‘He summons us to our doom!’

p.if: If you have the blessing of Alvir and Valmir, which confers Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm. Cross off your blessing and .
